author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video China, Beijing 1910, showcasing vibrant street scenes during the final Qing dynasty years. Highlights include hawkers, traders, artisans, and a barber styling a 'Manchu queue,' reflecting the city's rich street culture.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 
✔face restoration


Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: BFI (Free)
B&W Video Source: https://player.bfi.org.uk/free/film/watch-modern-china-1910-online

title: Beijing, China 1910 in color [60fps, Remastered] w/added sound
